game_ai

Class AIControler

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_ai.AIControler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIChasingControler, AIEvadeControler

    public abstract class AIControler
extends java.lang.Object
    The main function of AIControler class is to add simple artificial intelligence to game. User can attach controller to Sprite2D and bring artificial intelligence to it.Different subclasses of this class can bring different behavior to the Sprite2D.
    Author:
    Comexetina
    See Also:
    Sprite2D

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean eneabled
      set controller on or off
      protected Sprite2D source
      Sprite2D on which controller is attached.
      protected int speed
      source moving speed.
      protected Sprite2D target
      target of controller

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public abstract void update()
        Calculate x and y component ofsource speed and change source position. Best place to use this method is inside Sprite2D.update() because controller calculate speed and change position of the that Sprite2D in each frame. in each frame.
